sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { VentaService } from '../compPrincipal/venta/venta.service'; import { ListaVentasService } from '../lista-ventas.service'; import { Venta } from '../compPrincipal/interfaces/venta'; @Component({ selector: 'app-lista-ventas', templateUrl: './lista-ventas.component.html', styleUrls: ['./lista-ventas.component.css'] }) export class ListaVentasComponent { ventas: Venta[] = []; constructor(private ventaService: VentaService, private listaVentasService: ListaVentasService) { this.ventas = this.ventaService.getListaVentas(); } }
